title: Prope
description: Prope is an extension to an amazing project by Google â€“ "The Physical Web". It sets up an open platform for developers to make their physical IoT devices discoverable by the means of Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) Beacons and the Eddystone-URL specification.
These discoverable real-life objects help provide better contextual information to us humans and other smart-devices in its close proximity.
